Articles.Content:
Okay, so one of the Easter Egg is Neil Armstrong Memorial, on Mun. In the past, when the Kerbalmaps is running, we can just punch in the coordinate.

Now that it's down, we need to do it my manual

So base on this map of KSP wiki (https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/File:MunBiomeMap.png):

-Which crater is it in?

-where of the crater (north, west, south etc)

-Just outside of the crater or inside?

You can find it yourself with enough checks of Kerbnet

But it's in the Northwest crater, just inside the southern rim. There are 3 large procedural craters vertically North/South, looking like a snowman with a big head that's leaning over to the east a bit. It's just to the west of the middle one.

Edited July 18, 2019 by 5thHorseman
